assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Transport International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides franchised and non-franchised public transportation services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Franchised Bus Operation; Property Holdings and Development; and All Other Segments. The Franchised Bus Operation segment provides franchised public bus transportation services in Hong Kong. The Property Holdings and Development segment holds and develops non-residential properties. The All Other segment provides non-franchised public transportation services; and cross-boundary shuttle bus services between Lok Ma Chau, Hong Kong and Huanggang, Shenzhen. It also offers non-franchised bus services to corporations, residential estates, and schools through chartered hire services; and car rental and taxi hire services, as well as bus souvenirs. The company was formerly known as The Kowloon Motor Bus Holdings Limited and changed its name to Transport International Holdings Limited in November 2005. Transport International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Lai Chi Kok, Hong Kong.
